Articles.Content:
Tacician Aerospace and Computer Engineering Solutions Part Catalog

Our handy engineers are currently working on a wide variety of parts for both civilian and military use!

Parts for the Salvage Pack are currently under heavy research and development. (modeling and UV unwrapping)

SALVAGE PACK

Remember: One man\'s junk could be another man\'s SPACE junk!

Parts in the Salvage Pack will consist of 'salvaged' parts definitely not designed for the role they are being used in (i.e. a fire extinguisher as a retro motor).

Parts in the works are:


  • [li]0.5m Pod[/li]
    [li]0.5m Fuel Tank[/li]
    [li]0.5m Engine[/li]
    [li]0.5m Decoupler[/li]
    [li]0.5m Winglets[/li]
    [li]Large and Small retro motors[/li]
    [li]Radial RCS tanks[/li]

I am currently aiming for an alpha release this week. Just need to texture the engine and make a 0.5m decoupler.

Here\'s a preview of the pod and fuel tank:

And this is my first experience modeling and texturing things in Blender (not to say that my experience elsewhere is too great.....) so apologies if it looks a bit n00bish.

I am currently aiming for an alpha release this week. Just need to texture the engine and make a 0.5m decoupler.

Here\'s a preview of the pod and fuel tank:

-snip-

And this is my first experience modeling and texturing things in Blender (not to say that my experience elsewhere is too great.....) so apologies if it looks a bit n00bish.

I think it looks good

BTW if you want to make better textures you should use GIMP and do the following:

> Fill with grey/a colour you want to look like it\'s metal

> noise (change it until you like it)

> new layer

> render -> cloud

> make the new layer be transparent

> done. Enjoy

Check my pack if you want to see an example

I think it looks good

Thanks for the advice. The textures were just temporary anyway.
